item.title: 3.1 Connectivity: North-South
item.description: When using FortiGate with GWLB you can save money and not using NAT Gateways. NAT GW’s are charge for hour and usage, with the scenario you have here, the FortiGate can be your NAT Gateway for all the VPCs connected. NAT Gateways are used by private instances, what I mean is, the instances that don’t have public IPs. Instances that have public IP use IGW (Internet Gateway) to go to internet.

3.3 IPS: Log4Shell attack
